question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022?
raw_answer: Malibu Park Drainage Improvements, Annual Street Maintenance, City Hall Roof Replacement, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs
